title: v1.6.3.6-v3 Documentation Update
details:
Updated Copilot instructions and agent files to v1.6.3.6-v3 with new patterns:

## v1.6.3.6-v3 Key Changes
1. Circuit Breaker Pattern - CIRCUIT_BREAKER_THRESHOLD=15, CIRCUIT_BREAKER_RESET_THRESHOLD=10
2. Fail-Closed Tab ID Validation - validateOwnershipForWrite() blocks when tabId === null
3. Enhanced Loop Detection - ESCALATION_WARNING_MS=250, DUPLICATE_SAVEID_THRESHOLD=1
4. Faster Transaction Cleanup - TRANSACTION_FALLBACK_CLEANUP_MS=500ms (was 2000ms)

## New Module Variables (storage-utils.js)
- circuitBreakerTripped - Boolean flag
- circuitBreakerTripTime - Timestamp when tripped
- TRANSACTION_WARNING_TIMEOUTS - Map for 250ms warnings

## Files Updated
- .github/copilot-instructions.md
- All .github/agents/*.md files

All files verified under 15KB limit.
